import React, { useState } from 'react' const TaskCard = (props) => { const { title , id, handleUpdate, handleDelete, index, status, setTasks, setFiltered} = props const [queryTitle, setQueryTitle] = useState(title) const [edit, setEdit] = useState(false) const handleCheck = (e) => { console.log(e) setFiltered((filtered) => [...filtered, filtered[index].status = e.target.checked ] ) setTasks((tasks) => [...tasks, tasks[index].status = e.target.checked ] ) } return ( <> {!edit && (
{title}
)} { edit && (
{ setQueryTitle(e.target.value) }} />
)} ) } export default TaskCard
